knimeNode.name: SmallMoleculeMzTabReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node reads the small molecule section of the mzTab standard (as of 07/2013).

fullDescription.intro: This node reads the small molecule section of the mzTab standard (as of 07/2013) into a table. mzTab files from other sections of the standard will make the execution fail, so make sure that you only provide data from the small molecule section. Note: This read will ignore all optional columns in the table.

outPort.name: Table containing the small molecule data.
